summary.para: Gets the name of a property at a specified index in the property store.

param.name: iProp
param.para: The index of the property in the store.

param.name: pbstrName
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property's name. It is the calling application's responsibility to free this resource when it is no longer needed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of property names in the property store.

param.name: pdwCount
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the count of names.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the value of a named property from the named property store.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A pointer to the property name, as a Unicode string, of the property in the named property store.

param.name: ppropvar
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a structure that holds the property's value.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
If the property named in pszName is not found in the property store, this method returns S_OK and the pv member is set to VT_EMPTY.

summary.para: Sets the value of a named property.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A pointer to the property name, as a Unicode string, in the named property store.

param.name: propvar
param.para: A pointer to a structure that contains the value to set for the property named in pszName.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that get and set named properties.
